summary: Princess Evie of Jzafir is deposed by an evil sorcerer and his dangerous ally. Reena the Seer enlists the aid of the renowned hero Deathstalker to battle the forces of evil, including a clone of the princess, and win back her kingdom.
cast: John Terlesky|Monique Gabrielle|John Lazar|Toni Naples|María Socas|Marcos Woinsky|Dee Booher|Jacques Arndt|Carina Davi|Jim Wynorski|Douglas Mortimer|Maria Luisa Carnivani|Leo Nichols|Frank Sisty|Red Sands|Dan Savio|William Feldman|Nico Sarudiansky|Victor Bo
title: El último guerrero 2
